source.dda14e68:
# Sum, Subtraction
print('Sum:', a + 1)
print('Subtraction:', a - 1)

# Multiplication, Division
print('Multiply:',a * 10)
print('Division:',a / 10)

# Power, Square Root
print('Power:',a ** 3)
print('Square Root',a ** (1/2))
